$$
\begin{aligned}
    \overset{\rightarrow}{x}_i &= \begin{bmatrix}
           x_{contact} \\
           x_{alarm} \\
           \vdots \\
           x_{growl}
         \end{bmatrix}
  \end{aligned}
$$

$$\begin{aligned}
\overset{\rightarrow} x_i  & \sim \text{multinomial}(\overset{\rightarrow} p_i) \\
\overset{\rightarrow} p_i & \sim \text{dirichlet}(\overset{\rightarrow}\pi_i \theta) \\
\overset{\rightarrow}\pi_i & = \frac{\overset{\rightarrow} s_i}{\sum s_i} \\
\overset{\rightarrow} s_i & = \exp[\log(\overset{\rightarrow}\alpha) + \overset{\rightarrow}\beta * A_i]\\
\theta & \sim \text{exponential}(0.2)\\
\overset{\rightarrow}\alpha & \sim \text{dirichlet}(5, 0.5, 0.5, 0.5, 0.5, 0.5, 0.5, 0.5, 0.5)\\
\overset{\rightarrow}\beta & \sim \text{normal}(0, 0.5)
\end{aligned}$$


# Entropy

$$\begin{aligned}
-\sum_{i = 1}^{N}p(x_i)*\text{log}[(p(x_i)]
\end{aligned}$$
